column1: 18836575_16,s1,T2,T3,"Therefore, the effect of intravitreal injection of ",ET-1, on ,AQP4, expression in retina was tested.,Not_a_complex
18836575_16,s2,T4,T5,"As shown in Figure 2A, ",ET-1, injection resulted in a decrease in ,AQP4, mRNA as determined by Q-PCR.,Not_a_complex

18836575_16,s3,T13,T6,"Five out of 7 rats (71%) showed a significant reduction in mRNA (54+/-11%, p<0.001 versus ",HEPES,"-injected or control, Figure 2A), and there was a similar reduction in ",AQP4," mRNA upon elevation of IOP in six out nine rats (67%, 62+/-12, p=0.001, Figure 2B).",Not_a_complex
18836575_16,s4,T7,T8,A similar reduction was observed in ,AQP4, protein levels in ,ET-1, injected and IOP-elevated eyes.,Not_a_complex

18836575_16,s5,T10,T11,"As shown in Figure 3A, nine out of 11 rats (82%, Figure 3A) showed a decrease in AQP4 protein levels in ",ET-1," injected eyes (70+/-10%, p<0.05) and ",AQP4," protein levels decreased in five out seven rats following elevation of IOP (71%; 72+/-12% p<0.001, 3C).
